overview: Porn maniac Omar Galanti brings his camera into the darkest depths of the modern Italian woman for his new gonzo anal masterpiece, "Gape In Italy." For this special travelogue, the director has sought the most scenic examples of mature, experienced, uninhibited female starlets, ultra-filthy ladies with that anything-goes spirit and perverse Latin passion Omar's native country is known for. As a performer, Omar is an unrepentant sex freak, and the crazy MILFs in his cast match his twisted energy pound for pound!
title: Gape in Italy
